tool_description: Analyzes electrical grid availability and capacity at proposed sites to determine power supply options for network infrastructure.

search_radius_km.description: Search radius for power infrastructure in kilometers

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid search radius: Radius must be between 0.1 and 10 kilometers.
Power grid data unavailable: Electrical infrastructure data not available for this location.
Grid analysis failed: Unable to complete power grid analysis.
usage: Provide site coordinates and optionally specify search radius for power infrastructure. Returns analysis of available power options and grid capacity.

grid_availability.description: Whether commercial power grid is available

distance_to_grid_m.description: Distance to nearest grid connection in meters

power_quality.description: Power quality assessment: excellent, good, fair, poor

backup_required.description: Whether backup power systems are recommended
